title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 30 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 30 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Cosby and Weinstein were at the top of the #MeToo list. Political angles of the Cosby story. Our country depends on confidence in the justice system. Political prosecution of Trump organization in New York. Trump visits border, talks election and immigration mess. Rush's Timeless Wisdom: Chicago violence. Get to know Clay and Buck: Civil War camp and Bronx Zoo camp. Callers on Cosby, justice system, Civil War geeks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
